name: _MADPConfig
des: Required to add to your code entry of the app when using the React Native components on MADP (当使用MADP平台提供的React Native组件时，首先需要在入口文件配置全局常量)
title: MADP Global Constant (MADP全局变量)
content: ##Global Constant@@Required to add to your code entry of the app when using the React Native components on [MADP](http://mobility.lenovo.com).@@@@```@@global.__MADPCONFIG__ = {@@  tenants: 'lenovo',@@  appkey: 'appKey' // Use your own app key on MADP@@};@@```@@@@##全局常量@@当使用MADP平台提供的React Native组件时，首先需要在入口文件配置全局常量。@@```@@global.__MADPCONFIG__ = {@@  tenants: 'lenovo',@@  appkey: 'appKey' // 你的应用在MADP平台上的App Key@@};@@```@@$$$$$$$$@@global.__MADPCONFIG__ = {@@  tenants: 'lenovo',@@  appkey: 'appKey' // Use your own app key on MADP@@};
